mapper.sql: AgentUserId, AgentCompanyName, ApplyCount, CompleteCount, ApplyCountNew, CompleteCountNew, OrderCountNew, CartCountNew, UpdateTime
mapper.select:
SELECT d.AgentUserId,SUM(c.ApplyCount) as ApplyCount,SUM(c.CompleteCount) as CompleteCount ,d.AgentCompanyName ,e.ApplyCountNew ,e.CompleteCountNew,e.OrderCountNew,e.CartCountNew,e.updateTime from (SELECT a.TempId, a.ApplyCount,a.CompleteCount,a.BranchUserId,b.AgentUserId,b.BranchCompanyName FROM p_myproducttemp as a LEFT JOIN u_branches as b on a.BranchUserId=b.BranchUserId)as c LEFT JOIN u_agents as d on c.AgentUserId=d.AgentUserId LEFT JOIN p_agentmyproducttempview as e on d.AgentUserId=e.AgentUserId WHERE d.AgentUserId is not null
and (d.AgentUserId=#{branchcompanyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR d.AgentCompanyName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{branchcompanyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' ))
GROUP BY c.AgentUserId
ORDER BY e.ApplyCountNew desc
ORDER BY e.ApplyCountNew asc
ORDER BY e.CompleteCountNew desc
ORDER BY e.CompleteCountNew asc
ORDER BY e.OrderCountNew desc
ORDER BY e.OrderCountNew asc
ORDER BY e.CartCountNew desc
ORDER BY e.CartCountNew asc
ORDER BY c.AgentUserId desc
ORDER BY c.AgentUserId asc

SELECT c.AgentUserId, Count(c.AgentUserId) as ApplyCountNew from p_myproducttempapply as a LEFT JOIN p_myproducttemp as b on a.TempId=b.TempId LEFT JOIN u_branches as c on b.BranchUserId=c.BranchUserId WHERE c.AgentUserId is not null
and c.AgentUserId= #{agentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and date(a.CreateTime) >= date(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
and date(a.CreateTime) <= date(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
GROUP BY c.AgentUserId

SELECT c.AgentUserId, Count(AgentUserId) as CompleteCountNew from p_myproducttempapply as a LEFT JOIN p_myproducttemp as b on a.TempId=b.TempId LEFT JOIN u_branches as c on b.BranchUserId=c.BranchUserId WHERE c.AgentUserId is not null and a.`Status`in(3,6,5)
and c.AgentUserId= #{agentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and date(a.CompleteTime) >= date(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
and date(a.CompleteTime) <= date(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
GROUP BY c.AgentUserId

SELECT AgentUserId,COUNT(AgentUserId) as orderCountNew FROM o_userorders WHERE AgentUserId is not null
and AgentUserId= #{agentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and date(PayTime) >= date(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
and date(PayTime)<= date(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
GROUP BY AgentUserId

SELECT a.AgentUserId,COUNT(a.AgentUserId) as cartCountNew FROM u_agentcustomers as a LEFT JOIN p_myproductsinvites as b on a.UserId=b.InviteUserId LEFT JOIN u_users as c on b.UserId=c.UserID WHERE b.CartId is not null
and a.AgentUserId= #{agentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and date(b.CreateTime) >= date(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
and date(b.CreateTime)<= date(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
GROUP BY a.AgentUserId

SELECT b.AgentUserId,COUNT(b.AgentUserId) as cartCountNew from u_users as a LEFT JOIN u_branches as b on a.SourseUserId=b.BranchUserId LEFT JOIN p_myproducts as c on a.UserID=c.UserId WHERE a.SourseUserId is not null and c.CartId is not null and b.AgentUserId is not null
and b.AgentUserId= #{agentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and date(c.CreateTime) >= date(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
and date(c.CreateTime)<= date(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
GROUP BY b.AgentUserId
